snippet.title: Dialog System - Hyperbolica Devlog #7
snippet.description:
Just a quick detour to show how Hyperbolica's dialog system works.  With nearly 1000 NPCs, a custom dialog system and language was developed to simplify the process.

Hyperbolica on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1256230/Hyperbolica/
Join my discord: https://discord.gg/P9taqBJKJq
Merch: https://crowdmade.com/collections/codeparade
Support me on Patreon or Ko-fi:
https://www.patreon.com/codeparade
https://ko-fi.com/codeparade

This is part 7 of the Hyperbolica Devlog series.  Full playlist here:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLh9DXIT3m6N4qJK9GKQB3yk61tVe6qJvA

Music by Phil K.
https://willcomposeforfood.com/
